ctx: intros [R [C N]] H a x Ha Hx HaO Hax.
assert (HmultO : Mult a O = O /\ Mult O a = O).
exceptions.tactic: specialize (H a x HaxO) as [Hao | Hxo].
exceptions.exn: The reference HaxO was not found in the current environment.

ctx: intros [R [C N]] H a x Ha Hx HaO Hax.
assert (HmultO : Mult a O = O /\ Mult O a = O).

original: intros [R [C N]] H a x Ha Hx HaO Hax. assert (HmultO : Mult a O = O /\ Mult O a = O). { apply mult_O. apply R. apply Ha. } destruct HmultO as [MaO _]. assert (HaxO : Mult a x = O). { rewrite Hax. auto. } specialize (H a x HaxO) as [Hao | Hxo]. - contradiction. - destruct N as [_ [NI _]]. apply NI. + auto. + auto. + rewrite <- Hax. rewrite Hxo. reflexivity.
